titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the My home, my prison audiovisual materials
My home, my prison audiovisual materials
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Vishnu Jani

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-12-02T12:50-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Changed name of collection, number of boxes, changed Container list, added details to Scope and Content Note, added Items

did.unittitle: My home, my prison audiovisual materials

physdesc.extent: 24 manuscript boxes, 7 tape boxes, 6 cubic foot boxes, 1 oversized box, 1 card file box

did.abstract: Relates to the Palestinian activist Raymonda Hawa Tawil. Film made by Erica Marcus and Susana Muñoz. Includes raw footage and sound recordings.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], My home, my prison audiovisual materials, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2002.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Relates to the Palestinian activist Raymonda Hawa Tawil. Film made by Erica Marcus and Susana Muñoz. Includes raw footage and sound recordings that went towards the making of the documentary film. Footage and recordings are interviews and various shots that comprise the film.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 333 motion picture film reels featuring various types of film footage related to the documentary "My Home, My Prison".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 188 sound film reels that make up the soundtrack of the documentary "My Home, My Prison".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 48 audio cassettes and 3 sound tape reels related to "My Home, My Prison" documentary

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 6 VHS video cassettes and 3 U-matic video cassettes related to the documentary film "My Home, My Prison".

did.unittitle: My Home, My Prison, VHS video cassette, 65 minutes

scopecontent.p: VHS video cassete with total running time of 65 minutes
